title: Give a gift of self-growth with this $50 Headway Premium subscription
content:
Macworld

If you know somebody with a big stack to read and no time to read, Headway Premium can break down any personal growth reading list. Now through October 31st, a lifetime subscription to this self-improvement app is only $49.97 (reg. $299).

Headway gives users 15-minute summaries of popular texts available in audio and text form, ideal for commuting, travel, and just managing a busy life while prioritizing self-growth. The summaries pull in the ideas and critical points of non-fiction bestsellers so you can determine whether you want to dive in more deeply.

Summaries are downloadable, so you won’t lose your place if you lose your connection. A fun, game-like approach to self-improvement helps keep users motivated with streaks, achievements, tracking, and inspirational quotes and widgets. 

Plus, Headway always recommends personalized content for users, offering relevant and curated collections depending on their areas of interest. There are currently over 1500 book summaries, and 30-50 new ones are added monthly!

Help someone hit their personal growth targets sustainably when you gift them Headway.

Grab a lifetime subscription to Headway Premium for just $49.97. This exclusive deal ends October 31st at 11:59pm Pacific!
